blogPost.excerpt: Sell more and save time with GPT-3 generated subject lines, preview text and email content. Automate your sales with easy drag n drop emails, personalized product recommendations, cross-selling and winback automations. Attract and retain your high spenders.
blogPost.body: Sell more and save time with GPT-3 generated subject lines, preview text and email content. Automate your sales with easy drag n drop emails, personalized product recommendations, cross-selling and winback automations. Attract and retain your high spenders.
blogPost.title: Machine Labs - The AI marketing expert that helps you rocket your sales
blogPost.author: Ailidh Forlan

localize.description: 使用GPT-3生成的主题行、预览文本和电子邮件内容，销售更多产品并节省时间。通过简单的拖放式电子邮件、个性化产品推荐、交叉销售和自动赢利来实现销售自动化。吸引并留住您的高消费人群。
localize.tagline: AI营销专家，帮你的销量扶摇直上。

localize.description: 使用GPT-3生成的主題行、預覽文本和電子郵件內容，銷售更多產品並節省時間。通過簡單的拖放式電子郵件、個性化產品推薦、交叉銷售和自動贏利來實現銷售自動化。吸引並留住您的高消費人羣。
localize.tagline: AI營銷專家，幫你的銷量扶搖直上。

previous.excerpt: Finding what to watch, read, or eat has become too difficult. So we created Friendspire, a simpler way to find and save new favorites. 🔍 Better 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷 recommendations 🔖 Save and ➕ rate in one place 🗒️ Discover & build lists 🤝 Connect with friends
previous.title: Friendspire 2.0 - Find better recommendations for what to watch, read or eat

localize.description: 寻找观看、阅读或吃的东西已经变得太困难了。所以我们创建了Friendspire，一个更简单的方式来寻找和保存新的收藏夹。🔍更好 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷推荐 🔖保存和➕率在一个地方 🗒️发现和建立列表 🤝与朋友连接。
localize.tagline: 找到更好的推荐，看什么，读什么，吃什么。

localize.description: 尋找觀看、閱讀或喫的東西已經變得太困難了。所以我們創建了Friendspire，一個更簡單的方式來尋找和保存新的收藏夾。🔍更好 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷推薦 🔖保存和➕率在一個地方 🗒️發現和建立列表 🤝與朋友連接。
localize.tagline: 找到更好的推薦，看什麼，讀什麼，喫什麼。

next.excerpt: The YouTuber ATM machine. Creator Cash allows you to access YouTube earnings immediately. No more waiting an entire month to get paid. Uploaded a video today? Get paid today! Coupled with earnings analytics, Creator Cash is the financial hub for YouTubers.
next.title: Creator Cash - The app for creators to get paid without waiting

localize.description: 优德娱乐场w88提款机。Creator Cash 允许您立即获得 YouTube 收入。不再需要等待整整一个月才能获得报酬。今天上传了一个视频？今天就可以获得报酬 结合收益分析，Creator Cash 是 YouTubers 的财务中心。
localize.tagline: 创作者无需等待就能获得报酬的应用。

localize.description: 優德娛樂場w88提款機。Creator Cash 允許您立即獲得 YouTube 收入。不再需要等待整整一個月才能獲得報酬。今天上傳了一個視頻？今天就可以獲得報酬 結合收益分析，Creator Cash 是 YouTubers 的財務中心。
localize.tagline: 創作者無需等待就能獲得報酬的應用。
